column2: "Niiiiiiice! You really took all that stuff I was sayin' about sending 'em flying to heart, didn'cha?"
"I learned a whole bunch about the Coast, thanks to you. It's crazy what you can pick up through a monitor!"

"Alright, time I lived up to my promise!
I'm gonna take what you showed me and channel that into my own growth!"

"70 enemies, here I come!
Thanks for all your help, pal!"
